dataIdInfo.idAbs: Choose the location classes that you want preserve.

tool.name: Loc_Class

param.name: in_file
param.dialogReference: You may use the dropdown to choose a <p_> feature Layer from the map TOC, or use the browse button to choose a feature Class from the GDB.

param.name: lcBox
param.dialogReference: Checked LC's will be preserved, UN-checked LC's will be filtered.

param.name: newFields
param.displayname: Don't create Log file, add filter column instead
param.dialogReference: By default, tools will output a new filtered feature class and a _log with the locations that were filtered. Check this box if you prefer to have the filter output include all of the input locations, with filter info appended to new "Filter Name" and "Filter Parameters" columns.

tool.summary: Choose the location classes that you want preserve.
tool.usage: NOTE: If you UN-check "GPS" the deployment location will also be filtered. Use the Location Type filter to separate FastLoc GPS from Argos locations instead.
